channel.title: Runescape 498 (2008 Remake)
channel.description:
Welcome to Runescape 498!
Join us at http://fnplive.com/bs/ (Website in use until dedicated website)
Features: *100% working GE *Gravestone Changer *Quests (Most) *Working skillcapes *100% Bounty Hunter *Barrows *Fight Caves *Working skills (Construction needs work) *Pest Control *Fully working specials *Working clan chats *Party Room *Tutorial Island *Godwars Dungeon *Working Music *Stronghold of security *Working Clue Scrolls

item.title: Runescape 498 (2008 Remake)
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:549955”][quote author=Mezzyscape562 link=topic=668835.msg4472978#msg4472978 date=1424151005]
Why start a 498 now, and are you using the old Arios?
[/quote]
Says the one using the old arios.[/quote]


Old Arios can’t do these things, as a matter of fact, old Arios has rendering problems and many dupe problems. I encourage you to try mine out and see those things not appear.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape 498 (2008 Remake)
item.dc:creator: @briney21 briney21
item.description:
@briney21 wrote:

played around 30 seconds of the tut island then left haha everything is bugged in there fishing spot looks like a bunch of ice spikes stuck together, no items would appear in inventory, none of the tabs would show up like skills or anything fires wouldnt appear… its a disaster :palm:

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @briney21 briney21
item.description:

whats xp rate? what have you done? like added any new content? added say corp or bank tabs or anything because them pictures put me off playing this.

Read full topic
